name: Stylish editor - Monokai
description: A monokai style for the Stylish style editor.
additional_info:
Should work with Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox and Opera.

The example url is an example of a site that isn't affected by this style. This was necessary due to the fact that I had to have an example http/https site for submission of this style.

I do not own that site, there is no need to click the link
